name: Rohim Mia
cooking-method1: Boil rice, fry spices, add meat, layer with rice, cook covered
cooking-method2: Cook chicken, fry spices, add rice, simmer, garnish with nuts
cooking-method3: Fry fish, cook onion-tomato, add spices, simmer with fish.

name: Abul Kashem
cooking-method1: Knead dough, roll flat, cook on griddle with oil.
cooking-method2: Cook rice and lentils, fry spices, add vegetables, simmer.
cooking-method3: Marinate fish, fry in oil, serve with rice and lemon wedges

name: Monwar Hossain
cooking-method1: Slow-cook meat with spices, onions, and tomatoes until tender.
cooking-method2: Boil meat and lentils, blend, fry spices, simmer
cooking-method3: Boil goat liver and stomach, fry onions, add spices, simmer.

cooking-method2: Cook rice and lentils, fry spices, add vegetables, simmer.
cooking-method3: Marinate fish, fry in oil, serve with rice and lemon wedges

cooking-method3: Boil goat liver and stomach, fry onions, add spices, simmer.
